name: Format a number. Two decimal places. toFixed
instruction:
The `formatNumber` function takes one number as input.

This number must be returned rounded to two decimal places.

Use `toFixed` for rounding. Convert the result to a number using unary plus.

```javascript
const num = 1.111;
const numStr = num.toFixed(2); // string '1.11'
const numNum = +numStr; // the number 1.11
```

Examples of running the function:
```javascript
formatNumber(1) // 1
formatNumber(1.1) // 1.1
formatNumber(1.11) // 1.11
formatNumber(1.111) // 1.11

formatNumber(1.99) // 1.99
formatNumber(1.999) // 2
```
